project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program to fetch and display current weather information for a given city utilizing a public API.

task.name: Implement function to fetch weather data using a public API
Parse the fetched weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and conditions
Implement functionality to display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for fetching, parsing, and displaying features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
